import s from './StylePizzaOrder/PizzaOrder.module.css' import React from "react"; import {NavLink, Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; import LastSeenContainer from "../../LaterSeen/LastSeenContainer"; export class LaterSeenOrder extends React.Component { NewSize28 = () => { this.state.item.cost = this.props.item.cost this.setState({ size: 28, cost: this.props.item.eat.cost, ves: 370, style_line28: s.line28, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.no }) } NewSize33 = () => { if (this.state.cost < this.props.item.eat.cost * 3 || this.state.cost > this.props.item.eat.cost * 2.6) { this.setState({ size: 33, cost: this.props.item.eat.cost * 2.7, ves: 580, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.line33, style_line45: s.no }) this.state.item.cost = this.props.item.cost * 2.7 } } NewSize45 = () => { if (this.state.cost <= this.props.item.eat.cost * 4) { this.setState({ size: 45, cost: this.props.item.eat.cost * 4, ves: 1240, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.line45 }) this.state.item.cost = this.props.item.cost * 4 } } componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState) { if (prevProps != this.props) { this.setState({ photoURL: this.props.item.eat.photoURL, name: this.props.item.eat.name, structure: this.props.item.eat.structure, cost: this.props.item.eat.cost, size: this.props.item.size, ves: this.props.item.ves, item: { photoURL: this.props.item.eat.photoURL, name: this.props.item.eat.name, amount: this.props.item.amount, cost: this.props.item.cost, } }) } } state = { photoURL: this.props.item.eat.photoURL, name: this.props.item.eat.name, structure: this.props.item.eat.structure, size: this.props.item.size, cost: this.props.item.eat.cost, ves: this.props.item.ves, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.no, item: { photoURL: this.props.item.eat.photoURL, name: this.props.item.eat.name, amount: this.props.item.amount, cost: this.props.item.cost, } } BuyItems = () => { this.props.buy(this.state.item, this.state.cost, this.state.size) } render() { let view if (this.props.item.eat.id < 14 && this.props.item.eat.id >= 1) { view =
